attributes.action: Improve road safety by marking speed camera locations clearly with the speed and distance to a camera on the road surface.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If "safety" cameras are there to slow vehicles down and not raise funds, I propose to have markings on the road surface showing that there is a: - 
 1. Speed cam in E.G. 100 yards
  2. Speed limit E.G. 30MPH       This can be done easily with a speed cam sign the same as on the road side signs and the traditional speed limit signs like those already used on the road surface.
In addition the rear of every speed camera is to be marked with a high visibility
Marking showing the limit covered by the camera e.g. 30, 40 ,50 etc.
This if done will reduce the revenue from cameras but also it will reduce the "did not see the warning signs" complaints from drivers BUT it will also slow vehicles down at “accident black spots”.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
